lines.text:
[to Oliver]
You're handsomer than ever, but this neighborhood could use a facelift.

They call me up at this hour the miserable Cockney to say they've gone to Disney World! Disney World! And who am I going to get now! Nobody! Because nobody wants to have dinner with the rat family! Trouble! You don't know what trouble is either of you!
What were Ricky and the dessert man fighting about?
Inflation...
Inflation! Inflation! Ricky and the dessert man had to have a fight about inflation! In the kitchen! It is almost five o'clock!
We can't use the aspic.
I know we can't use the aspic. Ricky and the dessert man have stomped all over it! Do you suppose we could call up the aspic lion store and order another one?
I don't think there is an aspic lion store...
I know there isn't an aspic lion store! That is the point! that is the whole point!
Love your books, love 'em!
What's your favorite?
That one ya see in all the airports with the naked bimbo on the cover. What's that one called?
Heidi.
I'm Larry Renault! Not some hick tourist!
Paula comes in looking like a rat, you come in looking like a rat! What are we, the rat family?
I've tried this in three different places and it just doesn't... feel right.
You are the plant person. that is why you are here, to do the lants. don't know what to do with the plants! I've lost a dinner guest!
That's no elevator! It's a birdcage! What's the matter, Jordan? You anti-technological?
I love profligate guest, jackets with linings... swiss chocolates apre' sex...
Still?
Still.
Get rid of her before she starts drinking your aftershave!
